mapper.select: SELECT plan_no FROM production_plan WHERE plan_no LIKE CONCAT('WO-', #{date}, '-%') ORDER BY plan_no DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO production_plan( plan_no, plan_type, plan_start_date, plan_end_date, product_code, bom_code, plan_quantity, plan_remark, plan_created_by, plan_status, plan_priority ) VALUES( #{planNumber}, #{planType}, #{planStartDate}, #{planEndDate}, #{productCode}, #{bomCode}, #{planQuantity}, #{remark}, #{createdBy}, #{status}, #{priority} )
